mapper.select: SELECT member_no, email, password, nickname, gender, birth, phone, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y.%M.%D') AS create_date, DATE_FORMAT(update_date, '%Y.%M.%D')AS update_date FROM member WHERE email
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, gender = #{gender}, birth = #{birth}, phone = #{phone}, update_date = now() WHERE email = #{email}
